DOC.brief_title: Autologous Cord Blood Cells Brain Injury Term Newborns
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose pilot study evaluate safety feasibility infusion autologous ( patient 's ) umbilical cord blood cell term gestation newborn infant hypoxic-ischemic encephalopathy . For study , infant sign moderate severe encephalopathy birth cord blood collect birth receive cord blood cell 3 day age . Babies follow neurodevelopmental outcome 1 , 4 - 6 , 9 - 12 month 18-24 month . MRI brain obtain 1-2 week 4-6 month old .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Autologous umbilical cord blood available 2 . > 36 week gestation 3 . Brain injury satisfies criteria therapeutic hypothermia 4 . Parental inform consent 1 . Inability enroll 3 postnatal day age . 2 . Presence know chromosomal anomaly . 3 . Presence major congenital anomaly . 4 . Severe intrauterine growth restriction 5 . Infants extremis additional intensive therapy offer attending neonatologist . 6 . Parents refuse consent . 7 . Attending neonatologist refuse consent . 8 . Failure collect infant 's cord blood and/or laboratory unable process cord blood
